title: Mince stuffed tomatoes
ingredients: ['8 firm beef tomatoes', '500g lean minced beef', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 large carrot, peeled and grated', '1 celery stick, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon dried mixed herbs', '1 beef stock cube', '1 tablespoon plain flour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '150g grated Parmesan or mature Cheddar cheese']
